SKT_FIRST.name: Penetrating Tentacles
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> chance to increase the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Attack</color> for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与え、<color=#28d9ed>50%</color>の確率で自分の<color=#28d9ed>攻撃力</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間UPさせる。
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격하고 <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> 확률로 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>공격력</color>을 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 증가시킵니다.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_zh: 攻击敌人,并有<color=#28d9ed>50%</color>的几率使自身<color=#28d9ed>攻击力</color>提升,持续<color=#28d9ed>1回合</color>。

SKT_SECOND.name: Invocation of Evil
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: Grants <color=#28d9ed>Sustained Recovery</color> to the caster and the ally with the lowest Health for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp: 自分と最もHPが低い味方単体に<color=#28d9ed>継続回復</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間付与する。
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_kr: 자신과 체력이 가장 낮은 아군에게 <color=#28d9ed>지속 회복</color>을 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 부여합니다.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_zh: 使自身和生命值最低的友军获得<color=#28d9ed>持续恢复</color>效果,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>。

SKT_BURST_1.effect: Effects are applied to all allies

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Quo Vadis
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks all enemies and grants a <color=#28d9ed>barrier</color> to all allies for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.\nThe strength of the barriers increases proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Attack</color>.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp: 敵全体にダメージを与え、味方全体に<color=#28d9ed>シールド</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間付与する。\n自分の<color=#28d9ed>攻撃力</color>が高いほどシールド量がUPする。
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr: 적 전체를 공격하고 아군 전체에게 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>실드</color>를 부여합니다.\n자신의 <color=#28d9ed>공격력</color>이 높을수록 실드의 효과가 증가합니다.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_zh: 攻击全体敌人,并使全体友军获得<color=#28d9ed>护盾</color>效果,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>。\n自身<color=#28d9ed>攻击力</color>越高,则护盾强度越高。

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> chance to increase Attack for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> chance to grant increased <color=#28d9ed>Attack</color> to the caster for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(汎用)</color>:攻撃後、<color=#28d9ed>100%</color>の確率で攻撃力が<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間UPする。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color>:攻撃後、<color=#28d9ed>70%</color>の確率で自分の<color=#28d9ed>攻撃力</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間UPさせる。
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 컴패니언 효과</color> : 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>100%</color>의 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 공격력이 증가합니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>공격력</color>을 증가시킵니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_zh: <color=#ffd732>连携技能自由顺序效果</color>:攻击后,有<color=#28d9ed>100%</color>的几率使攻击力提升,持续<color=#28d9ed>1回合</color>。\n\n<color=#ffd732>夹攻效果</color>:攻击后,有<color=#28d9ed>70%</color>的几率使自身<color=#28d9ed>攻击力</color>提升,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>。
